project_context.target_audience: Women in reproductive age seeking professional, trustworthy cycle tracking
project_context.theme_strategy: Light Mode Dominant (Soft/Pastel Archetype with High-Contrast Typography)

visual_enhancers.textures: Use subtle noise overlay (opacity 0.03) on solid backgrounds to prevent sterility.

layout_strategies.dashboard_grid: Bento Grid Mode B: Dense, data-correlated. Use 'col-span-2 row-span-2' for the main Calendar/Cycle view.
layout_strategies.landing_page: Tetris Grid Mode A: Asymmetric. Overlap images with text. Use generous whitespace (py-24 or py-32).

component_strategies.buttons: Pill-shaped (rounded-full). Primary buttons should have a subtle shadow. Secondary buttons should be 'ghost' style with hover bg-pink-50.
component_strategies.cards: Clean, white cards with 'shadow-soft'. No heavy borders. Use 'p-6' or 'p-8' internal padding.
component_strategies.inputs: Minimalist. Remove default heavy borders. Use 'bg-muted/50' with 'focus:ring-1 focus:ring-primary'.
component_strategies.calendar: Custom Shadcn Calendar. Style the 'selected' day with a soft circle (rounded-full) and brand color. Weekdays should be uppercase and small (text-xs tracking-widest).

hero_images.description: Woman in white dress holding flowers - Hero Section

textures.description: Soft pink abstract flower - Background/Card Accent

instructions_to_main_agent: 2. THEME: Update 'tailwind.config.js' and 'index.css' with the 'Botanical Trust' color palette defined above. This is CRITICAL for the 'soft' look.
3. FONTS: Import 'Playfair Display' and 'Manrope' from Google Fonts in 'index.css'. Apply 'font-serif' to headings and 'font-sans' to body.
4. COMPONENTS: Customize Shadcn components. Remove default 'rounded-md' and replace with 'rounded-2xl' or 'rounded-full' as per strategy.
5. DASHBOARD: Build the 'Dashboard' using the 'Bento Grid'. The Calendar is the hero element (col-span-2). Use 'Recharts' for the Cycle History graph.
6. LANDING: Use the 'Tetris Grid'. Hero section must use the 'Woman in white dress' image with a 'glassmorphism' overlay for the CTA.
7. PRIVACY: Add a 'Privacy Mode' toggle in the UI that blurs sensitive data (simulated visual effect).
8. TESTING: Add 'data-testid' to all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, calendar dates).
universal_guidelines: Avoid generic 'SaaS Blue'. Stick to the Pink/Lavender/Teal palette.
Use 2x more padding than you think is necessary.
Never use pure black (#000000). Use the deep charcoal defined in 'foreground'.
Animations must be slow and smooth (duration-500 or duration-700), not snappy.
